website_summaries.verdict: The BlueAnt Q2 is yet another BlueAnt winner, with new Bing-411 features and fantastic call quality even in windy situations.
pros: The BlueAnt Q2 is slim and slender, with an impressive voice control interface that includes text-to-speech and access to Bing-411 services
It also has A2DP streaming, multipoint connectivity, and amazing sound quality
cons: The BlueAnt Q2 has very tiny physical controls, and there are quite a number of commands to remember

customer_reviews.title: The first one I received came in very poor packaging, just a small zip lock bag
customer_reviews.text: The first one I received came in very poor packaging, just a small zip lock bag, causing it to be scratched up. I immediately returned it and the second one showed up in just as poor packaging but not al scratched up so I decided to go ahead and accept it as I didn't want the hassle of another return. At first it worked pretty well and was only slightly uncomfortable. In less than 6 months this has become difficult to hear and regularly drops calls. Furthermore, the screening on the face is peeling off as well. The dang thing is falling apart. I do not recommend buying this.
customer_reviews.author: David H.

customer_reviews.title: Great! BUT.......
customer_reviews.text: Packaging looked old, used. The item is great though, except the quality is poor. a few months after use, The rubber brand "Q2" fell off, the filter covering of some sort on the mouthpiece or mic also fell off. THEN on 10/29/13 the bluetooth just started to break apart, the volume control was not there anymore, I placed it on my shirt pocket, and when i pulled it out, the thing was in 2 pieces. But after taping it together it still works! So I'm giving it a 3 star! Yaaay! But my other bluetooth from plantronics have used it for more than 2 years still intact, just lost it. This one never even used frequently.Oh well never again!
customer_reviews.author: Dred

customer_reviews.title: Strange packaging, but very cool device
customer_reviews.text: I didn't read the ad closely enough to learn that this unit, although new, didn't come with any factory packaging, extra earpieces or a manual. Turns out none of that mattered, the earpieces it came with are fine and the website is informative and the BlueAnt unit is INCREDIBLY easy to configure. My previous headset was a Jawbone, the BlueAnt is a MUCH better piece, the voice commands truly make it hands free, the call quality is very good and the phone book compatibility is a very nice feature. The price difference for the "Bulk Packaging" makes this one of the best electronics deals I've ever gotten!
customer_reviews.author: JOC

customer_reviews.title: Great headset for Samsung Galaxy II (Android)
customer_reviews.text: I finally decided it was time to trade up from my old Motorola headpiece. A friend recommended the BlueAnt headset, and I read the reviews and decided to go for it. Very happy with this headset. I'm not done exploring all its features, but call quality is excellent and it's super-comfortable. I highly recommend it if you're looking for an over-the-ear headpiece. My only issue at this point is the apparent compatibility problem between the voice activated calling and Google's address list. I haven't really dug into it, as it's not a high priority. It's nice to be able to listen to music on my headset, and it's great for hands-free calling.
customer_reviews.author: Evie Wi

customer_reviews.title: By far this was one of the best Bluetooths Jabra has made
customer_reviews.text: By far this was one of the best Bluetooths Jabra has made. I wish they would have given you a case but overall a strong performer. I would give this a rating of 6 if I could. I have had several over the years. I have been rough with them since no case but they have worked out well. I keep purchasing when I eventually wear one out. You cannot go wrong if you purchase one. Sadly, I think they are going to get extremely hard to find as Jabra no longer makes them. I will keep purchasing till the supply runs out.
customer_reviews.author: Keith A. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Honest review...
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd BlueAnt Q2. The first one was bought new and after a year or so just stopped working. The second one I bought used (not recommended) and had too much wear on arrival. The 3rd one just received through Amazon (bulk packaging) is disappointing. Will not respond to any commands. i.e. battery level, sensitivity level and all others. Also, my voice apparently is not as loud or as clear as my previous two were. Returning this ASAP for a replacement. The bluetooth is great when it works
customer_reviews.author: John W. Kovacs

customer_reviews.title: The Ear Clip is a Scam
customer_reviews.text: The blutooth device itself works great. However the ear clip is cheap thin plastic that will break. Don't buy the replacementsbecause they will break too. You can buy replacement earbudsthat will hold the device in your ear without the ear clip and now you look less like a dork. :). BlueAnt should really make the earclip out of metal and charge $5 more, instead of selling cheap replacements for $5.
customer_reviews.author: Michael R

customer_reviews.title: BlueAnt Q2 - fantastic bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: I bought the BlueAnt Q2 bluetooth because it was recommended to me by a good friend. I received it very quickly which I was shocked. I ordered it on a Wednesday and got it on a Friday (very fast). The BlueAnt Q2 bluetooth is fantastic. I like that I can hear who is calling me without even looking at the phone. The bluetooth downloaded all of my phone contacts to its memory so when someone calls the bluetooth announcer automatically announces who is calling me; also when you receive a call the bluetooth announcer asks you if you would like to take the call or ignore the call. Great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Lenci

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this bluetooth but
customer_reviews.text: This is the second Q2 i have bought. The 1st was from a B&M shop (worked great). The 2nd was an Amazon purchase (not so good) Product came in bulk packaging, i unboxed product, charged, paired, made a call. This particular Q2 continuously dropped calls as well as constantly unpaired itself from phone even as was using. My phone is always on my belt and the Q2 always in my ear. Should be no excuse for unpair. I recommend this bluetooth but, buy NEW in retail packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Sarge

customer_reviews.title: Good, but should've kept my Aliph Jawbone ERA for sound reduction
customer_reviews.text: This unit needs reset regularly. But it works well in quite areas and is VERY comfortable. The Jawbone ERA I returned to get this for $50 less was WAY WAY better noise (assassin) technology. The Q2 has "Windshield" which doesn't work. It will randomly kick in when there is sudden extreme background noise (wind in the car, etc). But if the noise is constant (road noise) it does NOT turn on WindShield and the noise level shows as a constant high red zone on the microphone icon on my Android screen. It can hear nothing clearly. Kind of defeats the purpose of owning it for talking while driving. Alas...
customer_reviews.author: STARMAN

customer_reviews.title: Great headset with voice control
customer_reviews.text: I just bought my second Q2 after losing my first. I've been using one for almost two years, and I love the thing: 1) Great sound - people can't always tell that I'm on a headset 2) Good wind isolation 3) Comfortable - stays in my ear without the external band 4) Great voice controls are easy to use. My latest purchase was in "bulk packaging." That turns out to be without the plastic clamshell, and with only one rubber ear piece and an external band. That's all I need though, and I was happy to save $10 and the plastic. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: J. Bower

customer_reviews.title: Like it even with quirks
customer_reviews.text: This ear piece is what I need to be able to use both of my phones at the same time with one ear piece. The sound is clear and others tell me I sound fine in a call. Comfort is ok, but then what ear piece is not a little annoying right. The one huge complaint I have is the occasional dropped phone . Sometimes when in a call my other connected phone will drop from the ear piece. I don't know why because it was not always like this .In the beginning it was fine. It does not always happen but it shouldn't happen in my opinion. So that's why the three star rate.
customer_reviews.author: Billm-i

customer_reviews.title: Buggy and Falling Apart
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality of this product is good, but the overall construction is not. It started falling apart within a week of purchase. The volume toggle switch fell off and disappeared and the casing is coming apart. The Blue Ant has a hard time recognizing voice commands and will often hang up my call when I say, "Yes," in response to the prompt, "Do you want to call_______?" I wish to return this product in exchange for a heartier, less buggy model.
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Dennison

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful BlueAnt Q2 Smart Bluetooth Headset
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement product for me, as the first one I purchased from the retail store was destroyed by my own negligence. The product I received from the seller arrived as indicated and in the condition advertised. This headset works just as well as my first and in my opinion is better looking because I purchased the platinum color. I HIGHLY recommend this product for someone who is truly looking to experience hands-free talking. The convenience of not having to look at my phone to see who is calling and to dial those people who are in my address book via voice commandis PRICELESS.
customer_reviews.author: DUQGIRL

customer_reviews.title: gene
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptic at first on what blue tooth to buy, and i am very happy with the choice i made. I work in a noisy truck and i needed a peice that was loud and clear enough to hear incoming calls as well as clearly understand any calls i take. i have had the peice about 3 weeks now and i am very please with the comfort, clearity and features of it. make sure if you purhcase this product to get the "retail packaging" this ensures that you will recieve all of the diff sized ear gels and your blue tooth will be comfortable for you.
customer_reviews.author: savvyshopper

customer_reviews.title: BlueAnt Q2 Bluetooth earpiece from "On Sale" Memphis, TN
customer_reviews.text: I found the seller of the earpiece to be very unreasonable and in addition the condition of the earpiece was less than expected. Parts of it were unglued, with only a charger and 1 earpiece not the multiple earpieces and ear buds that you would normally receive when buying this product. The ear bud that was supplied was not appropriate for my ear so I will not buy any products from this retailer again. AMAZON was great when I spoke to them about my comments............too bad this retailer is such a loose...........
customer_reviews.author: John Piper

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It does the job. It is a great price, good audio, almost not interference. It was easy to set it up, you just have to be sure you press the three buttons at the same time to re-set it. I also have to say they have great customer services. At least in my case, they seem to care if the product the sold to you meet your expectations. I have a minor issue that doesn't even have to do with the electronic parts but they solved the problem and they called me to ensure I was fully satisfy. I was surprise and of course appreciate that. Most of the stores don't even care. They do
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Easy to lose
customer_reviews.text: I really wanted to like this little earset, but had 2 problems with it: 1) it never quite seemed to sit right on my ear 2) since it's tiny and black and I travel a lot, I kept misplacing it. Now after 8 months of use, it's completely gone, and I'm looking for a replacement. My next earset will be larger and not black, that's for sure. On the plus side: it has a standard micro USB charger port and excellent battery life. Sound quality was so-so - not better than my previous 2-year old Plantronics bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: GW

customer_reviews.title: loud, but that is all
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the blue ant based on a friend's recommendation from a q 1. my q2 is nothing like his product. 1. it loses synchronization about once a charge 2. your conversation will be garbled if you do not wear on the same side of your body as your cell phone 3. your audio streaming will be garbled if you do not wear this on the same side of your body is your cell phone this is bs. bluetooth is old technology it should work better than this.
customer_reviews.author: G. Wernette

customer_reviews.title: Works great, shipped fast
customer_reviews.text: We've had this bluetooth for about a month and it's working great. My husband is an appliance tech and he needs his hands free to work while talking to tech support. This is the second Q2 we've owned (the first one didn't survive falling into a running dryer motor) and we've been pretty pleased. The over the ear loops don't hold up, but that's no different than the umpteen other brands we've tried. My husband is HARD on these things and the Q2 has held up the best. We bought the bulk package because we already has a supply of ear gels.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J Hull

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchase a few. They broke easily but I like them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound clarity
customer_reviews.text: I often put this blue on even when I don't need hands free, because the sound quality is far better than the phone itself. I connects quickly and is easy to use. Cons - the ear hook is rather wimpy, I bought a replacement for it that was much stronger... the pin that attaches tot he device breaks too easily. The voice commands are iffy, it conflicts too much with the voice commands on the phone so I don't often use it.
customer_reviews.author: H. C. Mclaughlin

customer_reviews.title: Poor Construction
customer_reviews.text: I loved this little headset until it started falling apart. It's the best DESIGN on the market but it's so cheaply made that it can't stand up to normal, everyday, use. Body heat seems to melt this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog77571

customer_reviews.title: the headset's manual is easily found online
customer_reviews.text: The charger didn't work out of the box, so luckily I had my own micro USB cord. The cheap over the earpiece snapped within a couple weeks, forcing me to surf amazon for a replacement part. The bulk packaging means it comes in a little plastic bag with no instructions of any sort. Luckily, the headset's manual is easily found online. As far as sound quality goes, I am impressed with that, as are those I converse with. Battery life has seemed quite reasonable too.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Johnstone

customer_reviews.title: Very good ear-piece
customer_reviews.text: My only complaint is the USB jack in the ear-piece broke off of its mount, and I could no longer charge it. It had good noise canceling for the low price. Sound level is good. Typical voice-assist for the price point - not great, but it works. Most phones have the voice recognition anyway. I think I spent $80. I've moved to an LG headphone because I wanted the stereo set up, but for a lower priced one ear headset, it is very good.
customer_reviews.author: YS Rider

customer_reviews.title: It's okay,
customer_reviews.text: This is my 4th BlueAnt Q2 Bluetooth. I really like them and I just wear them out because I use it everyday. I like it because I can still work and use both my hands and still answer and talk on my phone. This last one had too big of an earpiece to fit in my ear so I just took it off. Only problem is it started coming apart by the volume control. It fell off my ear onto the table and the whole volume control button fell out. I've only had it a month. Other than that I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Best Blue Tooth.
customer_reviews.text: I bought 3 of these two for gifts and one for myself, I have it on right now, its voice controlled and has different size ear pieces. Great quality, great price, if you need a blue tooth this is the one to get. It has call waiting also. Don't get a fine, get a good blue tooth. Great price, seller, and product. I highly recommend this item. I am a savvy shopper. I watch my budget closely. So this is they way to go. Thank you Amazon, Joyce
customer_reviews.author: joyful

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!! Great Price! Pieces Missing
customer_reviews.text: The Q2 is a great headset, voice quality if amazing, and battery life so far is great! It came with only the ear piece to use it by itself rather than the smaller circle ones that are designed to be used with the ear clip, besides that it is the best bluetooth headset i have ever used. Also beware the charging cable that comes with it is only 6 inches long, but it is micro usb so you probably have another charger laying around that you can use with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel R

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, great sound but very fragile!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, nice features, good looking, but way too fragile! The front edge mesh broke in the first week and they replaced it. The new one arrived already broken, so I didn't bother returning, figuring it would break again and over time much of the mesh chipped off. I got good use out of it for a year, but then one day it came out of my purse in pieces. If you get one, make sure you buy a hard case to keep it in or it WILL break!
customer_reviews.author: Cailin

customer_reviews.title: Do not purchase the bulk packaging version!
customer_reviews.text: I have already had issues with this headset. The over-the-ear piece broke in half after using for two weeks, and the mesh covering over the speaker area has already peeled up and scratches my face while I wear it. I have had this brand before and have never had this sort of trouble in such a short amount of time. I believe the issue is that it was a "bulk packaging" item and may be a cheaper version of the real thing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Huff

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money. Good service from the seller.
customer_reviews.text: This is a used unit. It works well. I would buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: D.B. Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Amazing blueant Q2 smart bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: Never have I ever experienced a Bluetooth with voice control. This one is just like it says "It's smart". Answers your calls and actually talks to you. Pairing was so easy. Wow how technology has changed. I own and android smart phone and the blueant Q2 was what I needed to go with this phone and I just love it. The clarity of sound is phenomenal, you would not believe it until you try it for yourself and it is reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.author: Zetella Bonner

customer_reviews.title: Great sound and functionality
customer_reviews.text: Still holding up well a couple of years later. I own a comparable Jawbone as well (actually purchased 3 different generation Jawbones), but I prefer this one for the additional voice commands. I have tiny ear canals, and even with the small one, it's tough seating it in, and it doesn't want to stay put. I definitely couldn't use it without the "optional" ear hook.
customer_reviews.author: Loni

customer_reviews.title: A good match for the iPhone
customer_reviews.text: The Blueant Q2 provides a stable bluetooth headset platform that works seamlessly with the iPhone and its controls. The earloop keeps the set securely anchored, and there's enough variety in earpieces to provide most users with a comfortable fit. Set up is easy and the unit is rugged-I managed to drop mine on a recent trip to Disneyland-it was turned in, none the worse for wear and still functioning perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Michael L. Craft

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: I've had my bluetooth for 2 weeks now. My biggest complaint is how it is held to your head. The rubber ear inserts that come with the device are not that easy adjust to your ear and my hook (the part that goes around my ear) is bending from its constant use. Other than that I think it's great that I can connect to multiple devices and it hold as my phone (iphone 4) contacts and announces them when it rings. Call quality is good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy
customer_reviews.text: Quality product. I bought two to share with my wife and her Samsung Exhibit and my Galaxy S3. Both paired in seconds, have great voice commands, are comfortable to wear. Battery life is good and you can ask the headset to tell you battery status. Call quality is very good. I chose this from several product reviews and a great price. The buttons are rather small but once set I find little need to touch them again until powering off.
customer_reviews.author: tiogasteve

customer_reviews.title: Nice earpiece but keeps disconnecting
customer_reviews.text: Because this had received so many great reviews I decided to give it a try. It does have great voice command functions, but just in the week I have had it, it has disconnected several times from my Blackberry. I have missed several calls and had them end up in voicemail while I had the earpiece in my ear. Sorry, but that won't work for me. I will be returning this and continue my search for the right headset.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne Jannetti

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding BT earpiece for the price. I've always gauged gadgets by their primary function. In this case, sound quality, reliability of sound/connection, and ease of connecting, all in that order. For the price, this earpiece has met my expectations. The voice features included are a little confusing and not as consistent, but to have said features in this price range is a luxury in itself...lest they don't work at all. Buy this for the base functions, if you want fancier features such as voice commands etc...look else where for a MUCH higher price.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Sivilaythong

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 headsets 1 for an Iphone the other for a samsung galaxy s 2. They both connected fine to each phone but when trying to talk to someone the sound quality was really poor did not matter which phone was being used. The headset was not very comfortable and the moouth piece end actually pressed into my cheek I think thisis why the sound quality was not so good I would not recommend this headset
customer_reviews.author: Jason n Mag

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend...
customer_reviews.text: The first one worked well. Excellent product. I was impressed. Unfortunately it went through the washing machine. Needless to say it is very, very dead. Tried to replace it with another. The first one would not charge or start up; the second one was DOA. I guess Amazon got a bad batch. Update: bought a new one. Has worked for several years now.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen R. Samborski

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay connected
customer_reviews.text: Paired without too much trouble and worked well for about a week, then started disconnecting itself and said no phone available. Now, won't even connect at all to the phone. Did a full reset per instructions and still a no go. Loved the idea of knowing who was calling by voice, but couldn't get it to keep connected with my phone. Had to go back to my old headset.
customer_reviews.author: George Fahr

customer_reviews.title: Would love to purchase again
customer_reviews.text: Would love to purchase again, and again, and again, best product I have used on the market with very high quality characteristics... again ear piece clasps are too flimsy making it easy to loose ear piece ! ! ! Causing constant replacement, therefore should be able to insure the device at the cost of the device???
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Kirk Harris

customer_reviews.title: A costly piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This is my 3rd attempt at the Q2 and this one fell apart within just a couple of weeks. This is the best sounding headset I have ever had but is built very poorly. What a shame that all the brilliance on the inside is not housed in a sturdy casing. Will have to look for something else now. What a waste of my money, shame on me for trying so many times.
customer_reviews.author: Vernon Lipscomb

customer_reviews.title: Worked, but not up to par
customer_reviews.text: Not very enthused with the functionality of the headset. According to callers, I was very difficult to hear even with little ambient noise. To compound this fact, the earbuds were EXTREMELY uncomfortable. After trying each earbud, I found myself struggling to keep it in my ear. After finding one that was a moderately good fit, it left me with a bump on my ear that took a day to go away.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew V

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, just not the one I got
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best Bluetooth headsets, unfortunately the one I received had some connection issues and I had to return it. The company I purchase from was very helpful, I wish it could have worked out better, its my favorite earpiece.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon6

customer_reviews.title: initially  good, then it completely stopped working KEEP AWAY STAY AWAY
customer_reviews.text: fist impressions were highly favorable, call quality etc, only the hard to use on / off switch was frustrating. then, after a few weeks, nothing. it just stopped working in the middle of a call. it had not been dropped, damaged, or gotten wet in any way. in fact, it was babied, and what do i get get? this thing is something to stay away from, and this supplier as well.
customer_reviews.author: wuzafan

customer_reviews.title: Great headset
customer_reviews.text: I love these BlueAnt bluetooth headsets. I walk my dogs everyday and can conveniently answer a call by saying "answer" even when my hands are otherwise occupied with leashes. The range is good, it is somewhat wind and noise canceling and I use it everyday. Price on Amazon was excellent. Delivery is as promised. You can't go wrong with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sherry Macdonald

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is my third one, I dropped one in water and the other got run over by a car. The problem that I have been having is keeping it hooked to my ear. I keep loosing it. It is very comfortable and most times I forget it is even in my ear. I love not having to look at my phone to see who is calling. I have many a earpieces and this has been the best that is why I keep repurchasing it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce4000

customer_reviews.title: Blue Ant Q2
customer_reviews.text: My first impression was positive, good volume decent connection to Bluetooth, but it changed when I tried to use it and would not charge. I put it away for awhile since we work outside and recently decided to start using it, and acted like battery dead. Notified support and they were nice about sending a refurb replacement. It worked fine for the first time, but tried to use it again and the battery life lasted about 30 seconds. Recharged, tried again, same response. Writing to support again to voice complaint and only reply to date is don't over charge more than 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Milklab

customer_reviews.title: Had to return this product
customer_reviews.text: The Bad: There was a pretty deep chip in the plastic where the peice that goes around the ear is attached to the bluetooth. The packaging was not good. It was sent to me in a plastic baggy instead of a box. The product was supposed to be brand new, but did not look like it at all. I normally have good experiences when I order things from Amazon. However, this company missed the boat. I returned the bluetooth immediately, and Amazon refunded my money. I ended up going to Best Buy and bought a Marque 2 165, which I am well pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Dios te bendiga

customer_reviews.title: Good, maybe better, not best.
customer_reviews.text: I like this blue tooth for the voice commands, quick boot, and clarity of sound. I don't like the ear loop. Maybe it's just my ear, but it never feels secure and rarely can I position it so it feels natural and "forgettable". Once in a while I seem to get it in just right so it feels like it would stay while I go about my activities, but I don't seem to be able repeat the process. . .
customer_reviews.author: Cisco's human

customer_reviews.title: Fidelity is good, switch is in an awkward place
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with this product. The audio is good (at both ends) and it fits well. It's a bit big, but that's not a big deal. I've used two other Bluetooth headsets in the past. This is the best of the lot so far. The toughest part is that the on-off switch is in an awkward position and very hard to engage by feel. I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: JPDillon

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!  That broke a month later...
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product...at first. Good sound quality, decent fit and comfort. But then after about a month of use, the thing fell apart. The earpiece broke off from the boom (main) part of the blueant, and the flex-circuit connecting the too broke, so the thing will no longer work. Trying to contact BlueAnt direct to get a replacement, but so far they are making me jump through hoops...more updates as they come in...
customer_reviews.author: Daniel D.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Range, but...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is pretty comfortable but doesn't stay together quite as well as you'd like. It needs some kind of retention bits for sizing instead of a clean slider and I find it way too loud. I've turned it all the way down on the unit and on my Iphone and its still painfully loud during most clear calls.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Troubleshooter

customer_reviews.title: Feed back
customer_reviews.text: Great product in gereral the Only thing it was shipped (in bag) with a big scratch on it, a bit disappointing. Would like update my review. Horrible customer service from the Care team @Blueant. Waiting 3 months for warranty replacement. Had to dispute my charge
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Amazin features and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: When it comes to the authority on electronics, I look to CNET. When they said this was in the top 5 of Bluetooth headsets. I immediately got on the best place to by....Amazon. Without a doubt, great price, shipped fast and tested it today....fantastic. Great features and the sound quality !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: VegasGolf G

customer_reviews.title: IT works better than most
customer_reviews.text: It works good Most of the time wen I speak some time it gets words all wrong is it my phone or Bluetooth after 6 moths it fell apart called customer service there had me send it in under warranty ,I will update how long and if there give any hassle There got it back to me in less than week with extra ear buds very good customer service
customer_reviews.author: LVfroggy

customer_reviews.title: Wait Until They Improve It!!!!
customer_reviews.text: it is very clear and sound quality is great. A2DP technology is great. BUT.. Talk time is 3.5 hrs to 4 hrs max and that is if you have not had it on standby. I would walk 10 feet away from my phone and would get immediate static.... and then the kicker.. it takes 3 to 4 hrs to get a full charge. I returned it. Not worth the money or time.
customer_reviews.author: A47

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the best Bluetooth I have ever had . I don't even have to look at my phone when I need to dial . I just hit the bottom on the side and say the name I wanted to dial it with connect me . If you are looking for a good Bluetooth . this is the one you need to buy .5 stars . I am a happy customer .
customer_reviews.author: Kj

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time! You will return it guaranteed!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe this is actually considered a Bluetooth earpiece it absolutely does nothing besides redial the last number that you had to manually dial because it only has like 3 functions redial, sync and to let you know you made a bad decision.
customer_reviews.author: luis

customer_reviews.title: Won't stay in my ear and don't drop it!
customer_reviews.text: who ever came up with this ear loop never wore this thing. I had it for 1 hrs and the ear loop had already broke. and while trying to still use it it fell out of my ear on to the floor and that was it. The whole thing was in pieces. Too bad I really liked the features. I
customer_reviews.author: Neil Mason

customer_reviews.title: Hello Hello can you hear me now?
customer_reviews.text: With out instructions on how to use this thing it is kind of impossible to set it up. The seller put it in a clear plastic bag and sent it no paper work no nothing. Now as to how good it is I have no clue as I cannot sinc it with my phone. It could be great I do not know.
customer_reviews.author: Lanny Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the worst Bluetooth headset I have ever purchased. I often must turn the Q2 off and use my phone because the person on the other end of the line can't heat me. Complained to BlueAnt the day I received the Q2, no reply so far. It looks like the quality of support is as poor as the quality of the headset.
customer_reviews.author: James R Lecomte

customer_reviews.title: I was told by customer service that the Q2 was ...
customer_reviews.text: I was told by customer service that the Q2 was totally hands-free. In fact, a button has to be pressed before voice activation can be used. I ordered the Q3 hoping that it is completely hands-free as described in the manual.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: The blue ant headset works well with my IPhone 4. It has no connectivity issues and is easy to use. Charging is simple and the battery life is more than adequate. The only problem is the size, our family keeps loosing the suckers! This is the fourth one that we've had and somewhere there is a black hole that is collecting scads of these little guys. Maybe if it came with a "finder" feature it would be easier for us. Overall, this is a great headset with good audio quality. Highly recommend this and will definitely purchase another one when this one goes astray. The loser-of-headphone-family.
customer_reviews.author: headphone-loser-family

customer_reviews.title: It's excellent.
customer_reviews.text: So I bought two of these. One arrived and was broken. No problems with the return and ordered a replacement one. The other one works perfectly. Synced with my iPhone 4s immediately. Uses a regular USB unlike my jawbone. Takes a little getting used to the commands. But for the price and sound. It's excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Spherehawk

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth Ear Bud
customer_reviews.text: This ear bud is the best I have found. It downloads your contacts from your phone and has a very intuative voice interface. I bought this one because I thought I had lost my first one. Now I have a back up I can count on.
customer_reviews.author: GARY W HICKS

customer_reviews.title: Good Features except noise cancellation
customer_reviews.text: This headset has axcellent voice command features and sync to ur phone contact list, which is really cool. The down side is the noise cancellation from background or wind, which is subpar. For cool features this headset has high marks. If you want superior noise cancellation, buy a jawbone.
customer_reviews.author: HastenedHero

customer_reviews.title: Sellers are great easy to work with
customer_reviews.text: Sellers are great easy to work with. I'm not thrilled with the Bluetooth. I like that it tells you who is calling. I don't like that you have to ask for phone comands befor you can text or make a call. My last Bluetooth you just said what you wanted. Example: read last text, call ..., send text to.. I will keep it but it is not what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Same as T1
customer_reviews.text: But better ear clip and better ear buds, battery does not last as long as the T1 and dies in about 8 hours. I am familiar about draining and recharging but it's been a week and died today in 6 hours. Good warranty and company so if there is a problem, I know they will fix it.
customer_reviews.author: 57_panhead

customer_reviews.title: A solid headset
customer_reviews.text: In general I liked the headset. The separate power switch is convenient. Sound quality is very good. So is the price. The only thing that I was a little disappointed with is that lack of multimedia connection. The audio from my phone for multimedia apps does not work with the headset.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Alford

customer_reviews.title: Missing piece.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this blue tooth, it did not come with the rubber boot for the ear which I had to buy separately. It should have came with it. Works ok. Just very disappointed wasn't expecting to buy a piece that should have come with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy N.

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bluetooth Headset
customer_reviews.text: I picked up the BlueAnt Q2 as a replacement to a long-serving Jawbone headset. I was pleasantly surprised to find that noise cancellation on the Q2 is comparable to that on the Jawbone. I also found that the feature that transfers all your contacts to the headset so you can hear who is calling was very handy. It's comfortable to wear, has stellar battery life, and comes with 4 different ear buds for a custom fit. As an added bonus, the Q2 charges using a micro USB cord, which means that any of the myriad cables I have can be used to charge it up. At less than $70, this is a headset that I would recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: a Whitaker

customer_reviews.title: This is not a new device.
customer_reviews.text: This gives all the appearance of a refurbished or clone device. The grill is not of same material or design as the new device has. It does work and that I am thankful for. For the price point I would have paid more for the OEM packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Marty D

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!
customer_reviews.text: This little gadget is amazing and I can't think of any other word to describe it. I'm not an electronics person but this little device ranks close to the most awesome one of all time, the Logitech Harmony One remote control. Try it you'll love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald D. Foster

customer_reviews.title: A far cry from quality
customer_reviews.text: I have owned numerous BT headsets, including Plantronics, Jabra, Bose, Jawbone, and this BlueAnt falls far short of any of these I have owned. Yes, I paid a bit more for some of these, but this one is by far the worst in all aspects. The Jawbone is by far the best...actually any model. Nothing else compares, and though I was buying this for a beginner, this falls far short of my expectations. Do not buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jeff Kapp

customer_reviews.title: My favorite bluetooth headset
customer_reviews.text: This is my second Blueant Q2 I have purchased. I liked the first one so well, that I bought the same one. Very comfortable on my ear and easy to use. My only complaint is that you have to stay pretty close to your phone or it disconnects. Not a big deal for me because I don't get very far away from it normally. Oh well, no biggie for me. Other than that, it's a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Chad Wright

customer_reviews.title: Money Wasted!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am experiencing episodes were my callers can't hear me clearly or it sounds like my voice is breaking up. I thought that the earpiece needed an update installed but I can't update it with my Mac or Windows. This was a bad purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ambient Lass

customer_reviews.title: ALL FALLS APART IN <90 DAYS!
customer_reviews.text: These OEM bulk packaging beginning to bother me. The greak every 2months! If that! I will invest in the original next time. I have 3 of these already and broke or came apart before 90 days!
customer_reviews.author: James Bond

customer_reviews.title: On my second unit, I'm tempted to buy a 3rd at this price for backup.
customer_reviews.text: I tried many headsets and this one is the best by far. My first unit lasted over a year. I used it everday in a construction enviroment. I streamed music all day and connected to 2 phones at all times so I'm sure I just wore it out. It performed flawlessly and sounded better than others I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Denny B

customer_reviews.title: BlueAnt Q2 headset a disappointment
customer_reviews.text: I researched Bluetooth headsets to find a quality device that would be compatible with my Droid M phone and from the ratings and write-ups chose the BlueAnt Q2. When the headset arrived I plugged it in to get a full charge. When complete I read the instructions, turned on the headset and I could hardly hear any sound - the volume was so quiet even turned up to full volume. The headset is supposed to automatically pair with the phone - which it did not. I tried to pair it with my device through the settings field but the device would not recognize the phone. Don't waste your money - find a better quality headset.
customer_reviews.author: Jimdo

customer_reviews.title: Takes a lickin' and keeps on tickin'
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so I just dated myself! I've had so many Q2's I've lost count. This is a very durable headset that delivers good sound quality and noise cancellation. I appreciate the way the ear hook actually helps keep the device in my ear. This item was shipped in bulk packaging so there were no additional ear buds. For the price I will order them from the company. My thanks to Fireball who shipped the order on time and in good condition.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Crownover

customer_reviews.title: I cannot recommend this item
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this item. The off on switch is not easily accessible, commands are cumbersome, voice recognition isn't always accurate and although it is paired with my contacts it does not recognize them when receiving a call from a caller to announce the caller's name. if your phone is set up for privacy and you have unlocked certain numbers to show your number when dialing, your number will still come up unavailable when using the Bluetooth. I do not know if this is due to my phone, a galaxy S2, or if it is indicative of all phones
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: Bought two Q2s on June; today Sept. 20 and neither will charge or turn on
customer_reviews.text: Blueant is great...however: Bought two Q2s on June7th; today Sept. 20 and neither will charge or turn on. May be old stock and batteries won't last; at least that is what Blueant says. I am a slow learner; I had bought a T1 last year and it lasted about 8 months.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Rumble

customer_reviews.title: The unit works great, but there were no instructions of any kind and no extra earbuds
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised when I opened the package. There were two items enclosed, the headset and a charger. There were no instructions of any kind. I was able to go on-line and download the instruction manual. The instruction manual stated that there were different size earbuds and earloops to fit different size ears. The unit I received only had one earbud and one earloop, fortunately, they fit my ear adequately. The unit works great! Much better than the Jawbone I had been using. Folks on the other end of the phone call tell me that I sound much clearer.
customer_reviews.author: Theron A. Jernigan, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: NO ONE CAN HEAR A WORD I SAY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i BOUGHT THIS BECAUSE CNET SAID IT WAS GREAT AND GAVE IT A 4 STAR RATING. EVERY TIME I USE IT PEOPLE SAY THEY CANNOT HEAR ME. NEVER FAILS THAT I HAVE TO TURN IT OFF AND USE MY PHONE RATHER THAN THIS HEADSET. I AM RETURNING IT! I HATE IT
customer_reviews.author: Vicky Grant

customer_reviews.title: Good reception, good price, how do I keep it on my ear?
customer_reviews.text: Good price, excellent reception. Only complaint is it is not very secure on the ear. They could do better with a design like the older Nokia bluetooth. It was secure, but would not work on my current phone. From standpoint of reception this is a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: ElCar

customer_reviews.title: Blueant Q2 provided by Dependable Resources...Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap product...ordered the first one...it didnt work at all...sent a second one and it didnt work either...very disatisfied with the company and the product they provided. Had to search for the phone number to call the company "Dependable Resources"...was told not to write a review but after the second headset came and did not work I cant help myself but to warn other customers not to order products from this company.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie

customer_reviews.title: Poor Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is fairly comfortable and decent battery life. Sound quality for callers hearing you has been reported as very clear with good background noise reduction. The sound quality from the earpiece however is poor at best. Regardless of reception or background noise, it is difficult to understand the person speaking to you. This product is similar to the 'tin-can-telephone' of childhood instead of 21st century technology. I have gone back to the Jabra Supreme for exceptional sound quality on both ends, noise reduction and all-day comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Al Fontaine

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality but very fragile. Ear piece broke after 2 weeks of use. BlueAnt service pace is glacial: 2 weeks after it broke and after emails to their support department nothing has happened. They are also putting unreasonable roadblocks after their product failed. For example in their last Email: "As long as you have the purchase receipt we can do this as the warehouse will not accept anything without a copy of that receipt sent a long with the package" Avoid this product.
customer_reviews.author: alain rossmann

customer_reviews.title: I've owned a couple Q2s and they're fine. I think the Q3 was a significant improvement
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a couple Q2s and they're fine. I think the Q3 was a significant improvement, though. In my opinion, the Q3 is worth the extra money in that the sound quality, range and battery life are improved.
customer_reviews.author: Sandi

customer_reviews.title: Gotta buy!
customer_reviews.text: This headset is fantastic! It sounds great! I drive a semi and no one on the other end ever hears my truck in the background. I have been standing outside the truck next to the engine and the conversation is always heard. The earpiece is very comfortable and the voice reading of my inbound text is very cool. My favorite part is telling me who is calling and being able to answer or reject a call without touching anything. This is truly a handsfree product.
customer_reviews.author: tulsaredneck

customer_reviews.title: Basic Blueant
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fancy about the packaging or instructions, but this is a basic Blueant Q2 that works exactly as advertised. There's no reason to buy something with tons of extraneous packaging when all you really need is the item itself. I would definitely purchase an item this way again.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Art

customer_reviews.title: Favorite bluetooth ever
customer_reviews.text: This is my husbands favorite bluetooth that he has ever owned. It syncs to his personal phone and his work phone, he can listen to music through it, and I can hear him when he talks to me without all the horrible background noises! I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: jgerson2211

customer_reviews.title: It worked pretty well
customer_reviews.text: The controls were easy to use, the voice control was pretty cool, if not a little quirky. It did it's job, I used it for about 2-2.5 years, but I got tired of all the quirks and have sense replaced it with a Jawbone Icon HD. Which I love! Just FYI.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Miller

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your time
customer_reviews.text: This has been the worst bluetooth out there. I bought it for my husband initially and after a few hours he came home and threw it at me and said that's a piece of garbage. So of course I tried it the next day and wanted to throw it in the garage. Once you pair it up and sync it to the phone you think great but all while it's in your ear it says phone not connected, phone connected. It continues to do that all the time. Annoying piece of junk.
customer_reviews.author: Shante Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Packaging horrible
customer_reviews.text: The packaging on this is horrible. First of all, it only came with one earpiece when the last Blue Ant I purchased came with several. There were no instructions. Fortunately, I had kept the old instructions from the previous one I had.
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm
customer_reviews.text: Works great and no issues so far. Bought this product along with a plantronics bluetooth headset. The plantronics worked well for about 10 months, now the headset reports that it isn't charged after fully charging etc. But this still works with no issues and both have been used for the same amount of time
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Ramdeen

customer_reviews.title: Phone calls is tricky- media syncs perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Works well. The only bad thing is that it is hard to get it to sync for phone calls. It syncs well for media, but it's a little bit of a trick for the phone calls, but eventually works.
customer_reviews.author: Jase

customer_reviews.title: really like it
customer_reviews.text: works well. range from phone is the only draw back i've had so far, other then that it's very good, up date doesn't hold a charge very well. a lot of the time after about 31/2 to 4 hours it tells you the battery is low and needs recharging.
customer_reviews.author: horseskipper

product_meta.title: BlueAnt Q2 Smart Bluetooth Headset (Bulk Packaging)

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars603 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
